section-1.title: WELCOME TO THE
section-1.subTitle1: BAYC is a collection of 10,000 Bored Ape NFTs—unique digital collectibles living on the Ethereum blockchain. Your Bored Ape doubles as your Yacht Club membership card, and grants access to members-only benefits, the first of which is access to THE BATHROOM, a collaborative graffiti board. Future areas and perks can be unlocked by the community through roadmap activation.
section-1.subTitle3: There are no bonding curves here. Buying a Bored Ape costs 0.08 ETH. There are no price tiers; BAYC membership costs the same for everyone.
section-1.note: Note: Thirty apes are being withheld from the sale. These will be used for giveaways, puzzle rewards—and for the creators' BAYC memberships.

buyAnSPS.title: The initial sale has sold out. To get your Bored Ape, check out the collection on OpenSea.

section-2.title: THE SPECS
section-2.subTitle1: Each Bored Ape is unique and programmatically generated from over 170 possible traits, including expression, headwear, clothing, and more. All apes are dope, but some are rarer than others.
section-2.subTitle2: The apes are stored as ERC-721 tokens on the Ethereum blockchain and hosted on IPFS. (See Record and Proof.) Purchasing an ape costs 0.08 ETH.
section-2.subTitle3: To access members-only areas such as THE BATHROOM, Apeholders will need to be signed into their Metamask Wallet.

section-3.title: WELCOME TO THE CLUB
section-3.subTitle: When you buy a Bored Ape, you’re not simply buying an avatar or a provably-rare piece of art. You are gaining membership access to a club whose benefits and offerings will increase over time. Your Bored Ape can serve as your digital identity, and open digital doors for you.
section-3.value2: Fair Launch, fair distribution: All apes cost 0.08 ETH
section-3.value3: Ownership and commercial usage rights given to the consumer over their NFT
section-3.value4: The Bathroom: A member's-only graffiti board
section-3.value5: Gain additional benefits through roadmap activations
